sentences.english: We'll have to do sentry-go, and ease off a point or so on the rum.
sentences.chinese: 我们会增派岗哨，大家也会少喝点朗姆酒。

sentences.english: We posted sentries at the gates.
sentences.chinese: 我们在大门口设了岗哨。

sentences.english: They are using some sort of scrambling device to deactivate our sentry guns as well.
sentences.chinese: 他们还用一种干扰设备使我们的岗哨炮台失去了作用。

sentences.english: Illegal mass picketing outside working mines led to violent clashes with the police.
sentences.chinese: 开工矿井外非法的群众岗哨引起了与警察的暴力冲突。

sentences.english: It is now possible to remove ammo from anchored sentry guns and missile batteries.
sentences.chinese: 可以移除已锚定的岗哨炮和弹道炮塔上的弹药。

sentences.english: We need a trick to get past the guards.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要用计骗过岗哨。

sentences.english: The sentinels, facing the banks of the stream, might have been statues to adorn the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 两名岗哨面向河岸，宛如两尊装点在桥头的石像。

sentences.english: Disused tea factory standing sentinel over tea garden hillside, Hill Country.
sentences.chinese: 山城，茶园丘陵上一个已经被废弃了的茶厂岗哨。

sentences.english: Then we need to forestall the sentry from checking our cards through their computer.
sentences.chinese: 接着，我们需要预防岗哨通过电脑检查我们的证件。

sentences.english: The sentry damage augmentor rig bonus is applied properly.
sentences.chinese: 岗哨炮伤害增强设备改装件加成已应用。

sentences.english: The checkpoints appeared designed to cripple Georgia's economy.
sentences.chinese: 这个岗哨似乎为了影响格鲁吉亚的经济。

sentences.english: Place 5 surveillance sentries at designated areas before the window of oppurtunity is closed.
sentences.chinese: 在规定时间内在指定位置安置5个监视岗哨。

sentences.english: Lothar destroys three outposts in the Black Morass.
sentences.chinese: 洛萨在黑色沼泽摧毁了三个岗哨。

sentences.english: Fishing, solarium, camping, picnic, sports, Sentry, and so on any occasion.
sentences.chinese: 垂钓，日光浴，露营，郊游，运动，岗哨等任何场合。

definition: to keep watch/to do sentry duty/to be on patrol
variant of 執勤|执勤[zhi2 qin2]
